dm

Class Npc

  • java.lang.Object
    • dm.Npc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Key_H

    public class Npc
extends java.lang.Object
implements Key_H
    The Npc class represents a non-player character (NPC) in the game. It implements the Key_H interface and contains various attributes and methods to manage the state and behavior of the NPC.

    Attributes include coordinates, speed, state, and various flags indicating the NPC's current status and actions. Methods are provided to manipulate these attributes and perform actions such as setting coordinates, speed, and actions.

    Example usage:

     
 Npc npc = new Npc();
 npc.setSpeedXY(5, 10);
 npc.setXY(1, 2, 0, 0);
